column4: hello, can wise people tell me if it is good to upgrade from dapper>edgy>feisty?
or should i stay with dapper
i just installed feisty on another partition seperate from dapper, im liking feisty
i shall install fiesty then, thank you for your input people
np, getting my feisty desktop to the point that my dapper was at only took like 2 hours of installing, feisty makes so many things easy
i believe so. im using compiz, which works great
but make sure you install gnome-compiz-manager to make your life easier
wireless didn't work at all on my wife's laptop w/ feisty, so i can give you much help there
well, wireless works on this computer under dapper, but when i go to fiesty it wont work with ndiiswrapper?
i would assume it will, i just couldnt get the latop to work. doesnt mean you wont be able to
